==Knowledge VS Wisdom==
  +   +
Books and Teachers can only give you the KNOWLEDGE of the METHODS to the path to accessing WISDOM.
  +   +
DEFINITION:
  +   +
1). KNOWLEDGE: it is a Collection of the Accepted Views based on what you have Seen at the Gross level,Read and Heard,and this Lacks in Direct Understanding. With Knowledge there is always a factor of Doubt, Uncertainty, Speculation, Lack of Control and anything that you,will have a T&E factor.
  +   +
2). WISDOM: The deep understanding gained by Direct Perception at all Levels giving you the Ability to Control and Manipulate the Factors. So in todays world this is absolutely Lacking, There are no actions that seem to have a Certainty, Everything rests on Speculation and T&E.
  +   +
Basic Differences between Knowledge and Wisdom are:
  +   +
** Knowledge is information gathered through external Sources and Resources, Wisdom is information Gained through Obervation.
  +
** Knowledge has it foundations in Ignorance & Darkness, Whereas Wisdom is rooted in Clarity and Light.
  +
** Knowledge Dwells in Uncertainty, Doubt, Indecision and Speculation at the foundation levels and its lacks a firm base, Wisdom has its base in Understanding,Perfectly established in Clarity,The Actions are Well Grounded and Firm at all levels.
  +
** Knowledge can be acquired from External Sources and Resources, Wisdom can only be acquired through Contemplation ,Meditation, Observation and is Purely Subjective.
  +
** Knowledge is Abundant, Wisdom is Scarce.
  +
** Knowledge CAN be shared, Wisdom CANNOT be shared.
  +   +
In todays world of the Fast and the Furious, Knowledge is all that we could find, It is absolutely lacking in Wisdom.
